akn:subsection.akn:heading: Report to security holders; time; contents

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Report to security holders; time; contents The indenture trustee shall transmit to the indenture security holders as hereinafter provided, at stated intervals of not more than 12 months, a brief report with respect to any of the following events which may have occurred within the previous 12 months (but if no such event has occurred within such period no report need be transmitted):— 11 So in original. The colon probably should not appear.

(b) Additional reports to security holders The indenture trustee shall transmit to the indenture security holders as hereinafter provided, within the times hereinafter specified, a brief report with respect to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Additional parties to whom reports to be transmitted

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Additional parties to whom reports to be transmitted Reports pursuant to this section shall be transmitted by mail—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Filing of report with stock exchanges

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Filing of report with stock exchanges A copy of each such report shall, at the time of such transmission to indenture security holders, be filed with each stock exchange upon which the indenture securities are listed, and also with the Commission.
